original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhussa puratas anāpucchāḥ āsane nisīdanti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhussa puratas an āpucchāḥ āsane nisīdissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhussa puratas anāpucchāḥ āsane nisīdanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdissanti.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhussa puratas anāpucchāḥ āsane nisīdissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa puratas an āpucchā āsane nisīdeyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āsane nisīdati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: anāpucchite vematikā āsane nisīdati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā āsane nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite āpucchita saññā āsane nisīdati āpatti pācittiyassa
āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
